name: Aqua Medical Spa
address: 1044 Dr. Martin Luther King Jr Blvd, Biloxi, MS 39530
description: Offers dermaplaning as a cosmetic procedure to remove dead skin cells and fine facial hairs, stimulating cell rejuvenation and improving skin texture

name: Plastic Surgery Center of Hattiesburg
description: Provides various spa services, including dermaplaning, which is described as an exfoliating treatment that removes fine facial hair and dead skin, leaving the face soft and smooth

name: Faces, PLLC
address: 1017 Highland Colony Pkwy, Suite 102, Ridgeland, MS 39157
description: Offers dermaplaning as a manual, non-invasive resurfacing technique to remove superficial layers of skin and vellus hair, improving skin tone and reducing the appearance of fine lines

name: Women's Pavilion of South Mississippi
address: 1242 Highway 29 North, Ellisville, MS 39437 (also serves Hattiesburg area)
description: Provides dermaplaning services using a medical-grade scalpel to gently remove dead skin cells and unwanted hair from the face

name: Mississippi Medical Aesthetics
address: 1105 Highland Colony Pkwy, Suite 102, Madison, MS 39110
description: Offers aesthetic dermaplaning as a skincare treatment that removes vellus hair and dead skin cells, leaving the skin smooth and radiant
